channel.title: cs.PL updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: cs.PL updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: When is the partial map classifier a Sierpi\'nski cone?
item.description: arXiv:2504.06789v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We study the relationship between partial map classifiers, Sierpi\'nski cones, and axioms for synthetic higher categories and domains within univalent foundations. In particular, we show that synthetic $\infty$-categories are closed under partial map classifiers assuming Phoa's principle, and we isolate a new reflective subuniverse of types within which the Sierpi\'nski cone (a lax colimit) can be computed as a partial map classifier by strengthening the Segal condition.
item.dc:creator: Leoni Pugh, Jonathan Sterling
